item.title: Notes on |xam
item.summary: A small red notebook containing lists of words and sentences and notes on the |xam language.
item.comments: 1) Although there is no informant given for these notes, |han≠kass'o comments on and gives names for fauna and flora on many of the pages of the notebook, 2) No book number
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)

keyword.subkw: names and descriptions of plants and animals
of plants and animals, given by |han≠kass'o
